figure_1: Distribution of the 100 articles by publication year.
figure_2: Proportion of the study types. (A) proportions for different designed studies. (B) proportions for study with different evidence levels.
figure_3: The visualized analyses of institution. (A) the top-10 institution with publications. (B) organization cooperation network.
figure_4: Network visualization of author co-citation. Co-citation: The relatedness of items is determined based on the number of times they are cited together.
figure_5: Information of keywords co-occurrence. (A) Keywords co-occurrence network. (B) Top-10 keywords of total link strength.
figure_6: Top-25 keywords with the strongest citation bursts. Year, the year that a keyword was firstly cited; strength, the citation burst strength of keywords; begin and end, the duration of keywords burst.
